attributes.additional_details: Visitors' passports used to exist years ago; they lasted for a year and cost about 12%(?) of the price of a 10-year passport.  I recently read that a 10-year passport costs over £77 which seems an awful lot to pay when you might only use this passport once or twice during this 10- year period; a Visitors' passport, if this was brought back, could cost £10 which would obviously be far more affordable.
